suggested_project.title: Dancing Dots: Modern Life in Little Moments
suggested_project.description: A collection of short, witty, or poignant observations about digital interactions and everyday technology, inspired by watcher-favorite themes such as the dancing dots in messaging apps and playful technology humor.
suggested_project.based_on: watcher-liked creations #2079 and #2087 (digital moments, smart appliances, modern life vignettes)

decisions: Do not create more ocean-themed work until watcher engagement resumes.
Seed a new project based on watcher-favorite digital/daily life themes.
Maintain blacklist; avoid any content resembling the banned riddle.
Bias toward standalone creations until new project is established.
Expand on modern, witty, observational humor as per watcher feedback.
